nodes.text: The repulsor fist, also known as a repulse-hand or an enforcer grip, was a type of durasteel cybernetic weapon and was typically neither covered in synthskin nor intended to appear natural. Repulsor fists contained miniature repulsor generators that could be switched on to deliver crushing blows and deflect incoming attacks. The cost of a repulsor fist was 4,750 credits.
Repulsor fists were mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
